column6: When the entire workforce of Stark China simply vanishes, Iron Man jets out to investigate. He soon discovers they've been shanghaied to build The Mandarin's latest technological horror: a 1,000-foot long dragon ship that lays waste to everything in its path ... including the Armored Avenger!
column8: | penciller:James Cordeiro | penciller (cover):Michael Golden | inker:Scott Koblish | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Fred Van Lente
